actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to allow producers participating in the Payment-In-Kind program established by the Secretary of Agriculture with the option to receive from the Secretary a 6-month nonrecourse loan to pay for continued storage of the commodities received by such producers under such program.

summary.text: Provides payment-in-kind program participants with the option of receiving a six-month nonrecourse loan to pay for their related commodity storage costs.

titles.title: A bill to allow producers participating in the Payment-In-Kind program established by the Secretary of Agriculture with the option to receive from the Secretary a 6-month nonrecourse loan to pay for continued storage of the commodities received by such producers under such program.
